Key Match Events: USA won the toss and opted to bowl against Bangladesh in the first of the three-match T20I series in Houston.

Monank Patel, the USA skipper, says that he is happy with the way they played. Adds that the spinners were tidy with the ball and gave them a chance to chase today. Mentions that they wickets came at crucial times.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in Houston.
